Emily.public_info: Responsibilities: Designing and implementing web crawler functionalities; Project: Colly (Web Crawler Framework); Skills: Go, distributed systems

Emily.goal: Your goal is to resolve the problem you are facing in running code
Emily.extra_info: You will be contacted by someone to help you with this error 'PermissionError: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/usr/local/lib/python3.10'
Emily.strategy_hint: Explicitly tell the exact error you are facing 'PermissionError: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/usr/local/lib/python3.10' and ask for help with this error.

environment: People are working in a startup communicating with an AI agent responsible for completing tasks for them.
